thread.title: Anita

author: Anita
title: Anita
text: TrustedHousesitters.com was an answer to our prayers. We always found it difficult leaving our cats and finding people willing to stay at our house while we were away. With this site you can pick a sitter that suits your needs based on their experience, reviews and references. The website is easy to use as well and we had all positive experiences with our sitters to date.
